targets.rawSql:
select c.metric as metric,
c.time as time,
coalesce(d.value,0) as value from 
(select distinct a.database as metric,b.mtime_epoch as time from 
(select database from db_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) and cluster=$cluster group by database) a , 
(select mtime_epoch from db_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) group by mtime_epoch) b 
where a.database in ($database) )c 
LEFT OUTER JOIN 
(select database as metric,mtime_epoch as time,CAST($shards_per_node as int)*CAST($num_nodes as int) as value from db_stats
where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) and database in ($database) and database not in ('metrics','stats')  and cluster=$cluster 
group by database,mtime_epoch
having  CASE WHEN sum(data_size)=0 then 0 else CAST(sum(disk_size) as decimal(18,1))/CAST(sum(data_size)  as decimal(18,1)) end  
between cast($ratio_min as decimal(8,1)) and cast($ratio_max as decimal(8,1))  
and (CAST(sum(disk_size)/1048576 as int) between $ratio_size_min+1 and $ratio_size_max)
)d 
ON (c.metric = d.metric and c.time = d.time)
order by time,metric

select c.metric as metric,
c.time as time,
coalesce(d.value,0) as value from 
(select distinct a.database as metric,b.mtime_epoch as time from 
(select database from db_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)  and cluster=$cluster group by database) a , 
(select mtime_epoch from db_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) group by mtime_epoch) b 
where a.database in ($database) )c 
LEFT OUTER JOIN 
(select database as metric,mtime_epoch as time,CAST($shards_per_node as int)*CAST($num_nodes as int) as value from db_stats
where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) and database in ($database) and database not in ('metrics','stats') and cluster=$cluster 
group by database,mtime_epoch
having (CAST(sum(disk_size) as decimal(18,1))-CAST(sum(data_size) as decimal(18,1)))/(1048576*$shards_per_node)
between cast($slack_min as decimal(10,1)) and cast($slack_max as decimal(10,1))  
and (CAST(sum(disk_size)/1048576 as int) between $slack_size_min+1 and $slack_size_max)
)d 
ON (c.metric = d.metric and c.time = d.time)
order by time,metric

SELECT
  channel as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  sum(waiting) as value
FROM
  smoosh_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) 
  and cluster = $cluster 
  and host in ($host)
  and channel in ($dbchannel)
  group by channel,mtime_epoch
  order by time, channel

select c.metric as metric,
c.time as time,
coalesce(d.value,0) as value from 
(select distinct a.database as metric,b.mtime_epoch as time from 
(select database from view_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) and cluster=$cluster group by database) a , 
(select mtime_epoch from view_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) group by mtime_epoch) b 
where a.database in ($database) )c
LEFT OUTER JOIN 
(select database as metric,mtime_epoch as time,CAST($shards_per_node as int)*CAST($num_nodes as int)*count(viewdoc) as value from view_stats
where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) and database in ($database)  and cluster=$cluster 
group by database,viewdoc,mtime_epoch
having CASE WHEN sum(data_size)=0 then 0 else CAST(sum(disk_size) as decimal(18,1))/CAST(sum(data_size) as decimal(18,1)) end
between cast($ratio_min as decimal(8,1)) and cast($ratio_max as decimal(8,1))  
and (CAST(sum(disk_size)/1048576 as int) between $ratio_size_min+1 and $ratio_size_max)
)d 
ON (c.metric = d.metric and c.time = d.time)
order by time,metric

select c.metric as metric,
c.time as time,
coalesce(d.value,0) as value from 
(select distinct a.database as metric,b.mtime_epoch as time from 
(select database from view_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)  and cluster=$cluster group by database) a , 
(select mtime_epoch from view_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) group by mtime_epoch) b 
where a.database in ($database)  )c 
LEFT OUTER JOIN 
(select database as metric,mtime_epoch as time,CAST($shards_per_node as int)*CAST($num_nodes as int)*count(disk_size) as value from view_stats
where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)  and cluster=$cluster and  database in ($database) 
group by database,mtime_epoch
having (CAST(sum(disk_size-data_size) as decimal(18,1)))/(1048576*$shards_per_node*count(disk_size))  
between cast($slack_min as decimal(10,1)) and cast($slack_max as decimal(10,1))  
and (CAST(sum(disk_size)/1048576 as int) between $slack_size_min+1 and $slack_size_max)
)d 
ON (c.metric = d.metric and c.time = d.time)
order by time,metric

SELECT
  channel as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  sum(waiting) as value
FROM
  smoosh_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) 
  and cluster = $cluster 
  and host in ($host)
  and channel in ($viewchannel)
  group by  channel,mtime_epoch
  order by time, channel

SELECT
  database as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
   CASE WHEN sum(data_size)=0 then 0 else CAST(sum(disk_size) as decimal(18,1))/CAST(sum(data_size)  as decimal(18,1)) end
FROM
  db_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)
  and cluster = $cluster and database in ($database)
  group by database,mtime_epoch
  order by time,metric

SELECT
  database as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  (CAST(sum(disk_size) as decimal(18,1))-CAST(sum(data_size) as decimal(18,1)))/(1048576*$shards_per_node)  as value
FROM
  db_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)
  and cluster = $cluster and database in ($database)
  group by database,mtime_epoch
  order by time,metric

SELECT
  channel as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  sum(active)+sum(starting) as value
FROM
  smoosh_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) 
  and cluster = $cluster
  and host in ($host)
  and channel in ($dbchannel) 
  group by channel,mtime_epoch
  order by time, channel

SELECT
  database as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  CASE WHEN sum(data_size)=0 then 0 else CAST(sum(disk_size) as decimal(18,1))/CAST(sum(data_size) as decimal(18,1)) end as value 
FROM
  view_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)
  and cluster = $cluster and database in ($database)
  group by database,mtime_epoch
  order by time,metric

SELECT
  database as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  (CAST(sum(disk_size-data_size) as decimal(18,1)))/(1048576*$shards_per_node*count(disk_size)) as value
FROM
  view_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)
  and cluster = $cluster and database in ($database)
  group by database,mtime_epoch
  order by time,metric

SELECT
   channel as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  sum(active)+sum(starting) as value
FROM
  smoosh_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) 
  and cluster = $cluster
  and host in ($host)
  and channel in ($viewchannel) 
  group by  channel,mtime_epoch
  order by time, channel

SELECT
  database as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  100*data_size/disk_size as value
FROM
  db_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)
  and cluster = $cluster and database in ($database)
  order by time,metric

SELECT
  database as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  cast (disk_size/1048576 as decimal(8,2)) as value
FROM
  db_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)
  and cluster=$cluster and database in ($database)
  order by time,metric

select a.metric,a.time,
CASE WHEN a.value < b.value then -10 else a.value-b.value end as value from 
(SELECT
  ioqtype as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  sum(requests) as value
FROM
  ioq_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)
  and cluster=$cluster  and host in ($host)
  and ioqtype in ('db_compact','db_update')
  group by ioqtype,mtime_epoch)a,
  (SELECT
  ioqtype as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  sum(requests) as value
FROM
  ioq_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)
  and cluster=$cluster and host in ($host)
  and ioqtype in ('db_compact','db_update')
  group by ioqtype,mtime_epoch)b
  where a.metric=b.metric
  and a.time-60 = b.time
  order by time,a.metric

SELECT
  database as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  CASE WHEN sum(disk_size) is null or sum(disk_size) = 0 then 0
  else 100*sum(active_size)/sum(disk_size) end as value
FROM
  view_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)
  and cluster=$cluster and database in ($database)
  group by database,mtime_epoch
  order by time,metric

SELECT
  database as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  cast (sum(data_size)/1048576 as decimal(8,2)) as value
FROM
  view_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)
  and cluster=$cluster and database in ($database)
  group by metric,time
  order by time,metric

select a.metric,a.time,
CASE WHEN a.value < b.value then -10 else a.value-b.value end as value from 
(SELECT
  ioqtype as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  sum(requests) as value
FROM
  ioq_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)
  and cluster=$cluster  and host in ($host)
  and ioqtype in ('view_compact','view_update')
  group by ioqtype,mtime_epoch)a,
  (SELECT
  ioqtype as metric,
  mtime_epoch as time,
  sum(requests) as value
FROM
  ioq_stats
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch)
  and cluster=$cluster and host in ($host)
  and ioqtype in ('view_compact','view_update')
  group by ioqtype,mtime_epoch)b
  where a.metric=b.metric
  and a.time-60 = b.time
  order by time,a.metric

list.label: cluster
list.name: cluster
list.query: select cluster from db_stats group by cluster

list.name: project
list.query: SELECT CASE WHEN substring(database,0,position('_' in database)) = '' THEN 'others' ELSE substring(database,0,position('_' in database)) END as project from db_stats where cluster=$cluster and database is not null group by project order by project

list.name: database
list.query: select database from db_stats where cluster=$cluster and database in (select database from db_stats where doc_count >= $min_db_docs and mtime_epoch in (select max(mtime_epoch) from db_stats)) and CASE WHEN substring(database,0,position('_' in database)) = '' THEN 'others' ELSE substring(database,0,position('_' in database)) END in ($project) order by database

list.label: dbnode
list.name: host
list.query: select host from ioq_stats where cluster=$cluster group by host

list.name: dbchannel
list.query: select channel from smoosh_stats where cluster =$cluster and channel like '%dbs' group by channel

list.name: viewchannel
list.query: select channel from smoosh_stats where cluster=$cluster and channel like '%views' group by channel

list.name: num_nodes
list.query: SELECT case when cluster like '%activesn.bkp.ibm.com' then 1 when cluster like '%cl11c74vip.ibm.com' then 3 else 3 end from smoosh_stats where cluster=$cluster

list.name: shards_per_node
list.query: SELECT case when cluster like '%activesn.bkp.ibm.com' then 8 when cluster like '%cl11c74vip.ibm.com' then 8 else 8 end from smoosh_stats where cluster=$cluster
